original_text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;
korean_text: 올라가실 때에 제자들이 자세히 하늘을 쳐다보고 있는데 흰 옷 입은 두 사람이 그들 곁에 서서

sentences.original_text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven
behold, two men stood by them
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 두 사람이 그들 곁에 서 있었더라
